reviews.review_msg: The best prof ever!!!!!!
Best prof I have ever had. Ever.
No Comments
great prof. very unconventional class in a good way. a refreshing reminder of what class should really be like.

Mr. boland is a very knowledgable prof, although he seems to be very ignorant to things that he beleives are wrong. not very open minded. he seems to think that his is the only class in the world, and that students have all the time in the world for his antics. take his class if you don't mind lisening to a sour old man 3 times a week...enjoy!
ask questions, ask ask ask.. participation in class is a huge portion of your final grade. very smart guy!

SFU needs more professors like Lawrence Boland! Challenges you to think, rather than memorize. As long as you are willing to participate, and actually do the readings, you are guaranteed a good grade....participation in class is IMPORTANT...make sure to ask  a lot of questions!

The Prof expects you to ask questions and actively participate in discussion in EVERY lecture. If your 1st language is not English, you are a DEAD DUCK. Midterm passing mark is 60%. Over 50% students failed.
The best class ever! Just attend and participate and you get your A!
Awesome prof. Very good course. Unique teaching style that is quite nice for change. Encourages learning rather then memorizing a textbook.
Very interesting professor. Makes you think, which is what a teacher should do.
Awesome prof. Rare and unique teaching style that actually ends up with you learning something. Recommended++
A very unique prof compared to Econ faculty.Easy course if you do what he says.Participate!Nice guy to talk to.

For sure, he is not an ordinary prof. However, as long as you do the reading and pay attention to the discussion in the class, you will find it very easy to get an A. I am very glad that I took this course since I learned so much from him. Try not to mind
Easily the best prof at SFU.

Very arrogant. He thinks that what he is doing in class is the most important thing in the world. He tends to judge people before he knows them and he'll also make fun of, and belittle students in class. However, the class was fun and easy.
Easy course.  Read material and participate in class.
best class ever. just don't let him know your political beliefs. he will give you a hard time no matter what they are.  you are not allowed to take notes in his class.
best one at SFU
No Comments
